name: A Normal Conversation
description:
There are still a lot of loose ends! You may need to refresh (or close and reopen) the page if you reach a black screen, since some of the paths don't lead back the start as they should (or are simply left incomplete).

Some things you can try doing:

- Staying completely silent

- Interrupting the characters as they're speaking

- Waiting for an appropriate moment to say something

For now this is mainly just a proof of concept for a more dynamic conversation system in Twine!
